CustomField.description: This formula field conditionally renders a button that will post the attached document on this Job Requisition to the "All Newmarket International" Chatter Group. If the "Has Attachments check box is checked, the button is rendered.
CustomField.formula: IF (Has_Attachment__c = true, HYPERLINK("apex/NI_JobReq_PostToChatter?id=" &Id & "&action=createChatterPost", IMAGE("/resource/PostToChatterGroup", "Post To Chatter"), "_blank"), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula field conditionally renders a button that will post the attached document on this Job Requisition to the "All Newmarket International" Chatter Group. If the "Has Attachments check box is checked, the button is rendered.
CustomField.label: Post Job Req to Chatter
